website_summaries.verdict: A trusted brand in automotive diagnostics with a few limitations – worth considering for both do-it-yourselfers and mechanics.
pros: A versatile tool for OBDII 1996 and newer vehicles capable of generic/manufacturer codes for numerous diagnostics
Has a sharp LED screen, convenient speaker, and patented One-Click key for emissions
cons: Some reports of it not working with all listed vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really lag and displays live OBD data pretty quickly once you scan it
customer_reviews.text: The scanner works really well. Doesn't really lag and displays live OBD data pretty quickly once you scan it. I used this scanner to diagnose a bad O2 sensor. I really enjoy how the scanner can show you readiness monitors (for DEQ testing) and lays it out in a simple to understand manner. I am a professional mechanic and use this scanner daily as a "quick check".
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent form factor, rugged, bright color display, intuitive menus and navigation, very good instructions, excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this scanner. Works exactly as you would expect. I did read the manual which contains a wealth of background information on the ODBII system as well as the use of this device. The LCD color display is fantastic (bright, easy to read, nice resolution). The device feels solid in your hand (does not feel cheap) and I like the rubber bumper which protects the unit from accidental drops. I feel this is a great value as compared to what you can find from Harbor Freight or Home Depot. Great value for the features this device contains. I am recommending this device for anyone in the market for a low cost OBD Scan Tool.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it! Wish I knew before spending thousands on others!
customer_reviews.text: I've gone thru these type testers every 5 years because most only cover 5 yrs. of model auto's. I've spent anywhere from $600-$250 for the ones that only work for a certain year model. For this price, and it working for 1996 on, you can't beat it! Not to mention the nice case and all cords that come with it; usable out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Durable Simple OBD II Scan Tool Under $70.00
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on 8/7/2013 and writing this review on 6/9/2018. Excellent product and simple to use for domestic, Japanese and German cars. Have been using this reader for over 150 cars personally and not in shop setting. Easily update scanner database using Autel update client software using Windows desktop or laptop (Win7 Pro 64bit and Win10 Ent 64bit). Durable thick rubber case and no issues with scanner after dropping multiple time. Heavy duty connection cables and protected ports. Recommended simple check English light (MIL) code reader under under $70.00. Basic OBD II Check Engine Light (MIL) and I/M readiness status reading are accurate and CAN features are available for import models.
customer_reviews.author: sfbay55555

customer_reviews.title: This product is one of the best auto scan tools that I have ever used and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best auto scan tools that I have ever used and well worth the price. My check engine light was illuminated on my pickup and the Autel Tool read the codes and provided information as to what was wrong. The dealership read the same codes and confirmed that the problems were exactly what the Autel AL519 had indicated. After I repaired my truck, my daughter drove it down the road as I ran a complete analyses on my truck's performance. I could not believe all the information the tool provided. Buy It!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: Quite a performer for the price - has all the features that I need, and more. Along with a bit of online research, by using this scanner's live data option I was able to determine that the check engine light and particular code related to a loose exhaust header pipe at the manifold, allowing excess air to enter the system and throwing off the cats. Normally the cats themselves would be suspected, but were in reality working as they should in this case. Tightened up the bolts, cleared the code, and now it has been running over a thousand miles with no more code issues.
customer_reviews.author: FOL

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this thing until I lost it! Pretty sure the wife in her cleaning frenzy touched it and now it's missing. I will be re-ordering it. Best thing about this, is that you don't need to download a specific car for $ each time, like the other OBD's from AUTEL. You just hook it up to any car, and it gives you the codes and suggest what it could be for you to check.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfsbain76

customer_reviews.title: The device is great as per the specifications advertised
customer_reviews.text: The device is great as per the specifications advertised. The delivery was a little bit delayed after customs clearance but overall smooth and quick.
customer_reviews.author: chrisTQ

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. I bought this because my EGR valve didn't want to ready and I couldn't pass smog because of it. So instead of me having to go back I bought this so I can test it myself to make sure it would pass before taking it in. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dcon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and functions, love the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: very nice! The quality is obvious. It connects and lists the codes. On some it will tell you the possible reasons and possible cost associated. I have already got my moneys worth in a month or so. It is bigger than some that I have seen, but it is nice and the case is nice. It has info that my friends cheaper one didn't. I would recommend this without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Technology!
customer_reviews.text: Well I've been putting off getting one of these. I don't know I guess fear of change, use to working on the old cars. This thing works really good. I have successfully turned off 2 engine lights. Makes trouble shooting much easier. Local auto parts store has one but this one is better, it had more possible causes for engine light being on. I don't think I'll buy another used car without putting this on first. I am glad I have made this progress, I feel like I can work on cars again.
customer_reviews.author: Popeye

customer_reviews.title: Best investment so far!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scan tool. It's probably the best investment tool I've ever bought. It works great and tells me what the codes I have on my 2000 Ford F-150. The code I had was a p0171 and that's what pulled up on the screen so I know it works properly. Remember the ignition needs to on before you use the scan tool otherwise you'll be reading nothing. Highly recommend the the Autel AL519
customer_reviews.author: David A Castaneda Jr

customer_reviews.title: Only for mechanics, who have computers with disk readers, and a ton of patience
customer_reviews.text: The only information that comes with this outdated device is a 61 page manual that takes you through the long, involved process to get this set up, at multiple levels in the software, in order to allow you to attempt to update the device. You must load software on your computer using a floppy disk in order to do the required update, of two separate systems, before you can begin using it. The instructions were not translated very well, many grammatical errors throughout. I just sent it back without doing all the prep, since I just wanted something I could plug into my truck and tell me why the check engine light is on.
customer_reviews.author: Scott76

customer_reviews.title: Its better than $130 innova scanners
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several brand and types of these OBD2 scanners. IT DOES NOT DO ABS! I knew that before i purchased, In the description it is described as an ABS reader as well as OBD2 scanner IT DOES NOT DO ABS! This is the best scanner for the dollar I bought a 300+ launch just to find out its not upgrade able and returned it. this Autel Is a lot easier to use and is more reliable The only thing it doesn't do that the 300+ Launch scanner is ABS. Great Scanner
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Already been more useful than I thought it would be. Used this to diagnose a trouble code on my wife's vehicle and my dad's. Makes clearing codes after a repair quite simple. The explanation for each trouble code is not amazing but its enough to give you a good idea where to start. The update process and software were simple. Only took maybe 5 minutes to have it all set up and ready to use. The screen is very easy to read and the buttons are solid.
customer_reviews.author: AMasterofMayheM

customer_reviews.title: Not happy...i can not give less than 1 star.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy i used it 3 times updated it and now the display will not function this is cheaply made.and will not last! UPDATE...I have contacted the company several times to resolve this issue,and every time after describing my issue was only met with silence they were either unwilling to help or had no solution So purchase this .....thing at your own risk. I have told everyone i know to steer clear of this company.To this day they will still not help.
customer_reviews.author: steven p brown

customer_reviews.title: Solid, basic scanner.
customer_reviews.text: While this is a good scanner, it does not seem to be too user friendly. The instruction manual seems to written by someone that has never written an instruction manual before and is a bit hard to follow. The manual could have been laid out better as well (editors fault?). Beyond that, there is a bit of a learning curve when using it, but once you learn it is easy enough, but this could have been avoided by writing a better instruction manual. The construction is not as cheap as some other people have said in their reviews, a nice solid, basic unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you keep a vehicle over 100,000 miles, it would be a good idea to have one of these.
customer_reviews.text: This has been VERY helpful in diagnosing problems and easier than running to the parts store and having them do it. I had a cylinder misfire and it gave me what could possibly be causing it. Though it turned out the problem was most expensive to repair, I did not have a mechanic trying 3 other things first to finally get the problem fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Lario

customer_reviews.title: Really Helpful Tool
customer_reviews.text: I went to two different garages to do smog checks and failed because of evaporated system leaks. The scanners at each station indicated that the failure was in the evaporation system from the gas tank but did not indicate what was causing the failure. Consequently, I spent a lot of money replacing parts without solving the problem. So I bought an Autel AL519 Scan Tool and did my own diagnosis. It showed me that there was a pinpoint leak in the system. Not only that, I was able to reset the computer which neither garage was able to do. It cost me another hundred dollars to get the problem fixed but thanks to Autel it is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Able Devildog

customer_reviews.title: OBD2 Mode 6
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to find a way to diagnose this misfire P0303 and tried a few others but none of them could read the misfire count. This one does and comes with a nice case and little booklet with descriptions on OBD2. Seems to have a lot of other features that could be nice. Like data recording and being able to plug into a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Amazon has best shipping
customer_reviews.text: Works great I have already pinpointed the cause of my CEL. The only thing is, I wish it was more descriptive in what the different tests mean and what are acceptable levels. I have had to go on an extensive Google search to figure out if my levels were good or bad. The first one I was sent did not work properly. I was emailed a prepaid shipping label to send that one back and next day shipped a new one. Thanks amazon for making shipping easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money 👌
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid for this, I got waaaaay more options than expected for the price range. The Foxwell scan tool I used to have, crap, keep giving me off the wall reading, so when I bought this, and the diagnosis were completely accurate, I sold the Foxwell NT 301 to a pawn shop. There was no comparison of who won.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Horrible scanner. Got it since Amazon had a deal for it. Went to install the update from the website and followed directions to the word, never found the update folder on my computer so the scanner can update. The emissions scan will always freeze on me when it was done checking monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Tapia-Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.  The unit has paid for itself with the repairs that I’ve made.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t fully used it’s capabilities but it helped me With three codes that the unit identified I was able to make repairs and now the codes are gone. The up date process per the operation manual was not straight forward but a call to tech support they quickly helped me get the unit updated. I wrote the procedure down in the tech manual for future reference.
customer_reviews.author: larry from Ill

customer_reviews.title: works well at diagnosing condition of engine and electronics
customer_reviews.text: I really needed an obd that could tell me if my emissions modules were ready for testing by the state; this did the trick; as an added bonus, it shows you real time analysis of your 02 sensors/ fuel trims and all that kind of stuff; for the money, its a very worthwhile investment
customer_reviews.author: Edward Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete product ,
customer_reviews.text: Obsolete product , they do not provide code on unit to register so you can obtain updates. This is a hard coded code that shows on screen under the information screen. The decision to purchased this over other units available , was the ability to update. Vendor support is a joke. Sent back for refund. Amazon was not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: performed the task
customer_reviews.text: This did everything I hoped it would. I used it to report on a check engine light on a 2004 Acura TL. It provided me with enough information to lead me down a logical troubleshooting path. YouTube videos and other online info kept me going in the right direction. I like this unit, and would buy it again, although I don't need to.
customer_reviews.author: BobZoom

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to have on hand for old or new car! Bought for an older car, very helpful, have since used it for several other cars. Good tool to have on hand!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Work like a Champ
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because the check engine light is on and I have change 2 gas cap already and every few weeks, the check engine turn on. I used this to scan and it actually is transmission lock up solenoid. Worth every penny and the reset of the check engine light is piece of cake.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: a toy
customer_reviews.text: In overall, the device is oversized. to my mind it could be made more compact. I have a feeling there is a lot of the empty space inside. To the word, I bought it to read fuel pressure parameter in live data, but could not find it It can read data only from Engine and AT MB w211.
customer_reviews.author: Arsen

customer_reviews.title: This device does what many tools cannot, and you ...
customer_reviews.text: This device does what many tools cannot, and you dont need to go to the dealer and pay them to do what you can do with this device....it already paid for itself on a friends Honda, and my Jetta. You can due full scans on fuel, and emission systems..discover error codes and remove then.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Great OBDII scanner at a good price. I used the data logging feature to help diagnose an intermittent with my 2002 Ford Focus. Beyond that, I've used this to scan several vehicles of different makes and models for fault codes and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Update - Stopped working and NOW they agree to send a NEW WORKING UNIT
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised they will send a new working unit. I hope the unit will work and diagnose correctly the check engine light. Thank you Autel
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great product for scanning codes!
customer_reviews.text: I used this scanner tool to pull codes from my vehicle. It’s very useful to diagnose issues and overall I am very pleased with the item. Thanks Autel!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: A Lot of Bang for the Buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this OBD II scan tool a long-time ago. For years I have depended on local parts houses to scan my cars for codes. It is a snap to uses and lean to use. The scanner stores in a great protective pouch. The reason this particular scanner was purchased was because of a review that touted it as being a lot of bang for the buck. I agree.
customer_reviews.author: David L Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleek device ...But
customer_reviews.text: The product just does not scan other cars. It was able to scan the vehicle I purchased it for (Subaru), but I also have other vehicles in the family......unfortunately it does not work. I tried Autel"s FAQ....even updating the software. No difference. So unfortunately you either have to purchase a higher model. So I have to purchase another device ....I can't take that chance with Autel.
customer_reviews.author: Tallman

customer_reviews.title: no more waiting on someone else, great for diy guys
customer_reviews.text: ordered this in February buy never used it till November but when I needed it, it put me on the right track. I know this works for all automobiles but if you have a chevy traverse this is a must have if you like fixing your own cars yourself. it comes in a nice case also with everything you need, as I use it more im sure I will like it even more,,,not so sure about the traverse though
customer_reviews.author: dean hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not for ALL Problem Codes !
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do it all. Of course description tells what diag modules are covered. But normal people may not realize there are additional modules this model can't diagnose. For example, this was great for my O2 Sensor prroblem, but could not tell me why my AirBag light was on. Do yourself a favor, research and buy a tool that will do ALL modules.
customer_reviews.author: Xriva Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: $68 SAVED ME $1000 BUCKS FROM MY THIEVING MECHANIC!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT ON MY TWO BMW'S! Mechanic said he would need no b/s $1100 to fix my 2003 325i. Bought this AUTEL519 PLUGGED IT IN AND FOUND OUT I needed a secondary air pump valve. Went on e-bay bought the part for $35. Removed two bolts on old valve, replaced with new one and presto all better!!! Saved my self $1000 dollars!!!! For gods sake just to keep your mechanic honest, even if you can't do the work yourself, never get taken again and invest $68 for piece of mind. WEEE NOW I CAN GO ON A LITTLE VACATION TO FLORIDA, AS I DRIVE BY MY MECAHNIC I'LL GIVE HIM THE FINGER!!
customer_reviews.author: GOD BLESS U.S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Very good scanner for the price. It does gives you as much detail about the vehicle ECM module and the process involved, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Villagomez

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great and no more begging someone to read codes. Well built, nice cable and carry bag. You do not need the more expensive units with all the data that tells you in detail what is wrong and how to fix it. All the codes are the same and all the help you need is on line.
customer_reviews.author: TXfromWI

customer_reviews.title: MONEY SAVING TOOL
customer_reviews.text: Following the instructions included with the Scan Tool, the problem code was immediately found. The information lead to my ability to correct the problem without the involvement of the Vehicle Dealer or Automotive Garage. The Autel AL519 can assist the vehicle's owner in the verification of a particular problem , eliminating unnecessary repairs. My Purchase of the Autel AL 519 was due to prior incidents of overcharge & misdiagnosed problem by an Authorized New Car Dealer. Simple problems, like a loose gas cap,can be corrected before a required emission inspections .
customer_reviews.author: R. Foyder

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is very easy to use and very easy to read. We were able to diagnose a cylinder 3 misfire with it. It's also a nice compact size that is easy to travel with. A good investment to have instead of going to the auto parts stores and using their older versions.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, but just be careful.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first OBD scanner. I am not really a car guy but know as much as oil change and spark plug replacement. Figure I can read the manual and learn how to use it. Got it for my 2012 Honda Civic with Check Engine Light. Quick scan and read the error codes (cylinder2 misfire) - google some potential fixes and got new spark plugs and replaced then erase all the codes (bad idea if you plan to smog your car). Erasing the codes required driving the cars about 70-100 miles to finish the drive cycle before the car can be smog tested again. The scanner works, save me hundreds from going to a shop.
customer_reviews.author: foojook

customer_reviews.title: Autel AL519 Review
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product to have as a DIYer. I used it and it gave the exact same codes as the dealer did on my Mercedes GL550. Plus to be able to upload the results to my laptop for record keeping is an added bonus for me. Thanks for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Willie C. Belton

customer_reviews.title: SAVE MONEY by getting this Automotive Engine Fault Code Reader
customer_reviews.text: Since the day I got this automotive engine fault code reader I saved alot of money by not going to mechanic for any car issues. Everytime my check engine turns on I plugged it in and it gives me a code and then I put the code on google or youtube it shows me where is the fault located. I would suggest this to everyone. Don't waste your money everytime by going to mechanic.
customer_reviews.author: Asif salik

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My 2006 f150 had a coil going out with this tool I was able to identify which coil it was and just replace the one bad coil.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Hazen

customer_reviews.title: Saved alot of money and time
customer_reviews.text: I own two cars and have been able to make sure both cars would pass smog inspections before going to the inspection station. I had replaced batteries in both cars and both needed to go thru their drive cycles, I was able to sit the scan tool in the seat beside me and periodically stop to check as the OBD Codes passed.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN C. WOLFE

customer_reviews.title: I'm a widowed senior and intend to learn more about its capabilities! its use.
customer_reviews.text: I sure like that there is a lot of auto (I purchased to use with my RV) info that I can obtain. Being widowed, I didn't have anyone at home to quickly explain things to me. A mechanic explained the steps to follow to achieve the results I wanted, checking on one aspect of the scanner's use. I it is easy to attach to the RV 's computer. Has a fine display. Easy to hold and read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent code reader for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent code reader for the money! It allows you to invoke on board diagnostic test built into the PCM. It has graphic displays for many sensors. I was able to determine that the o2 sensors on my 09 F150 with 164k miles had very slow response. I replaced them and am getting 2 mpg better mileage.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Way cheaper and way better than the ones the auto stores had! Just read the manual 1st and you're ready to rock, or at least ready to figure out what's wrong with your vehicle!
customer_reviews.author: Ryno357

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Attempting to update the product right out og the box and after spending some time reading information related to updates and the whole thing just went to dumps. Returned it a couple days later.
customer_reviews.author: Taabu

customer_reviews.title: This product is powered-up thru the OBDII (OBD2) port, ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is powered-up thru the OBDII (OBD2) port, the device has no internal-power-source, for instance, if you need to update the firmware? the device needs to be pluged into your OBDII port, and also connected to your computers-usb port @ the same time. In summary, 2 physical-coneections = OBDII & USB, are needed to update the devices firmware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: User-friendly
customer_reviews.text: Dependable, easy to use code reader. Works on foreign and domestic cars.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: Worked fantastic on an array of vehicles that I've checked so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for your husband so he leaves you alone
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this thing. I say buy it, and he will never big you again, because he will be too busy diagnosing problems on the cars and then pretending to know what he’s talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Peana Joertner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit expecting to get the ability to see gas mileage and other user-friendly information. This unit is adequate for diagnostics and viewing engine sensor information, but not for providing the type of info I was interested in, so I returned it. If I needed a scan tool that showed a lot of engine sensor/map/O2 and other info, this would be a good buy. I was more interested in the dashboard information provided by this unit:
customer_reviews.author: konz

customer_reviews.title: Works well out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I used this to diagnosed a problem on my 2004 Ford Expedition. All I had to do was plug the unit to the OBD connector under the dashboard. I was able to get the code, fix the problem and then reset the engine malfunction indicator light. Saved me a trip to the mechanic and enough money to pay for the unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Saura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.  Accurate diagnosis.
customer_reviews.text: This code reader is awesome for the price. It accurately diagnosed forward O2 sensor as bad on a 1997 Honda CRV. My coworker has borrowed it twice for his Jeep and it acurately diagnosed one of four O2 sensors. It also detected a bad gas cap.
customer_reviews.author: como651

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the right diagnostic tool so I can figure out what cylinder my 99 Ford f150 was having problems with. This tool has helped me save lots of money from buying parts that were not needed.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the best scanners you can get at this price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this scanner Monday 3/10/14 around noon. Chose the free shipping (slowest) and just got it today 3/15/14. Tested it on both my wife's 11' explorer and my 14' tacoma. The quality of the screen is pretty good. To compare it, ide say not as good as current smart phones, but more along the lines of good cell phones few years back. Connected fairly quick. Has tons of features and live data that I couldn't find on any other scanner at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to have in the garage so I don't have to run to the auto parts store for a reading.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to read the code on my car and to clear it. Didn't want to spend a lot of money and I thought what the hack if it doesn't work I will return it. This thing plugged in and worked perfectly. Easy to read screen and easy to clear the codes after fixing the problem. I used this on my three cars, older Lexus 07' 04' and a 03 and it worked perfectly and quickly on all of them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: william clever

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me figure out a problem with a 2011 Nissan Murano. A code popped up and it totally helped me to figure out what is wrong. I was able to buy the part and replace it myself. No $100 an hour for labor.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner
customer_reviews.text: works as expected. Had to read the manual a time or two but after that cleared the errors and good to go. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri Slim

customer_reviews.title: My Auto link saved me time and money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use out of the box. The auto link found an issue with car earlier enough to keep it from turning into a bigger problem.
customer_reviews.author: MidNOLA

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete product
customer_reviews.text: I was under the assumption that I could use this with my laptop but since the manufacturer won't register it, you can't update anything to make the PC app functional. It works as a stand alone device only. Why are they still selling this product if it's been outdated for 5 years? I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Voluntaryist

customer_reviews.title: Auto Troubleshooter OBDII scan tool
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my car and a family members and it works great. If you have any problems it will show trouble codes which then you can check to fix the problem. and after problem if fixed it can clear out the error codes if they were not cleared by mechanic or yourself before. You can also drive your car with this attached and then save the results in case you want someone more experienced to review the data. Item was a great buy as one of Amazons Deals.
customer_reviews.author: FJV

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but not simple!
customer_reviews.text: Fixed a pesky "check engine" light on my 2000 Honda Odyssey. Worked fine, right out of the box. Having said that, I will be spending some time reading the manual, figuring out some of the more advanced features. It is a well made, multi-function, unit, but unless you're some type of automotive pro, it will take some time to understand everything this unit is capable of.
customer_reviews.author: John O. McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Saves time and gas running to parts to check codes, very nice for can system. Great Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a device like this helps to solve a variety of problems and ...
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this model as it has a color display and does a wide range of vehicles from the mid 90's to the present. Today's vehicles are so complicated, electronically, a device like this helps to solve a variety of problems and how to fix them. For a mechanically inclined person, this is a must for the tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is really simple to use if you're looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is really simple to use if you're looking to get codes and errors. I haven't really gotten into the diagnostics yet but there seem to be a ton of options and features. Unit is really responsive and fairly quick loading.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. But NO ABS detection.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. But NO ABS detection, i knew this, but just reminding anyone who may be looking to get one with ABS. Helps me detect issues with the check engine light and fixing it myself. In-turn saving me money, time and probably headaches.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: Autel AL519 Color Screen OBDll/CAN Scan Tool
customer_reviews.text: I give the AL519 a five star rating as it is far better than I expected. I had replaced tha spark plugs in my 2000 Ford F150 and as I drove tested my work the Check Engine light came on. After receiving the AL519 and plugging it to my F150 gave me malfunction code and a statement on what was wrong. After changing a vacuum hose and doing the Driving Cycle, the AL519 showed that my truck would pass an I/M test. Very happy with my purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: florida man

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: I have used this from troubleshooting vehicles to diagnostics for buying a used vehicle. Just a great tool for every car owner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More capabilities than than ones sold at auto parts chains and way cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Live data and single PID graphing is nice. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Olson III

customer_reviews.title: Time & Money Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is well worth it's price! My husband is great at fixing things, but it's difficult with the newer vehicles. With this telling you what is wrong it cuts the time & frustration of figuring out what is wrong & makes fixing it much easier. After having friends spend $700+ in one year, and my husband spend many frustrating hours this is a time & money saver.
customer_reviews.author: Massie

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomended
customer_reviews.text: I used this scanner on my PT Cruiser that the check engine light kept coming on. It saved me so much money being able to know what I was dealing with and I didnt have to go to the dealer to have the light go off. btw the dealer wanted $150 to have that done. Since i got it, Ive been able to help a few friends also. Definately worth the price and more. I highly reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice And Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Have had no issues in years with this unit. Pulls everything right up and easily clears and checks codes. Had a lot of very cool live features and info built in from factory.
customer_reviews.author: zachr43

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I needed, read and clear codes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my 1998 Chevy Silverado 1500 had the service engine light on and it comes on from time to time but then shut off. I bought this reader and it read the codes and synced with all 3 of my cars and was really very easy to use. Out of the box it connected. I did update it as there was an update on 2/14/14 so I figured why not. But for the price and easy of use it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Myridge

customer_reviews.title: When I use it I can’t believe how nice it is all going to
customer_reviews.text: Are use it all the time to find out what the codes are matter-of-fact I just got a new truck and I use it on that camp Aleve how nice it is
customer_reviews.author: Edward h Schult

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Connects to my 2006 Subaru Legacy without any issues. Allows to monitor and store for a following analysis a lot of useful data. It would be more user friendly if the stored data have some separator between the field name and the value - otherwise I had to copy and paste corresponding fields into Excel manually. But in overall the devise itself is very well designed and has very user friendly interface.
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Pushechnikov

customer_reviews.title: The power of scanners that cost 10x the price
customer_reviews.text: Autel is a great brand. At our shop we have Autels that cost several thousands of dollars. This scanner does pretty much everything that other scanners do that cost up to a thousand dollars. Autel is a great brand and a great bargain. I'd recommend this to any tech starting out or a Lanuch scanner if you can get a good price on one. Those two scanners will get you well beyond most scan tools as far as ability to access mode6 and get pins that other scanners will not. Especially on imports. Have used to great extent on a Skyline and several Mercedes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fields

customer_reviews.title: Reads basic codes doesn’t function with software nor tell me the exact problem from trouble code
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed.. I installed the software on my windows computer and I tried to print out the data from my vehicle and it’s not allowing me to?? It keeps saying it’s not connected to the device and in honestly it is actually connected.. anyhow, I need an device that reads all codes and actually tells me WHAT problem needs to be fixed..
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Timing is everything. If you purchase this at right time. It will only cost you $51. Solid build. Previous one had connection problem, returned it. Second one is doing well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Cleared the codes myself and can now check the health of my 3 cars anytime I like. Very nice product and really
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because after an emission test- they did not put on the gas cap and I did not notice it. As is expected- the check engine light came on. I know some auto parts places will check the OBD II codes for free and clear them (mine would not), however, my service center charges $80 to read the codes. So I ordered this to see the problem myself- sure enough- that was the issue. Cleared the codes myself and can now check the health of my 3 cars anytime I like. Very nice product and really, really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Super and inexpensive DTC reader/resetter.
customer_reviews.text: We have an older ('01) Honda and this was bought to help us track down some DTC codes and fix the source. Works great, provides real-time data and made the job a snap - misfiring plug in cylinder #2.
customer_reviews.author: OHB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This was easier to use that I expected. Also, it does more than I realized. My handy mechanical neighbor who usually helps us with our vehicles ,was impressed with everything this one does. I'm very happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: easy to use but bulky
customer_reviews.text: good as* scanner. Easy to use, bulky tho. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Liz Eddington

customer_reviews.title: Very good scanner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, very good scanner, worked perfectly, no problems in connecting it to my 2005 VW Jetta, 2005 Chevrolet Aveo and 2004 Chrysler Neon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr VCR74

customer_reviews.title: You want to save money?
customer_reviews.text: This item always help me save money in car repair.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Tech Services

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after buying a OBD SCANNER at AutoZone for almost the exact same price and did way less and crapped out on me. This item was delivered fast and has good packaging. I tested this scanner already on three vehicles of mine and does exactly what it says it does. I am sure you can purchase a more high end one, but for this price its a good deal with a color screen, USB cable, CD software, instruction manual in only English and a nice carrying case to top it off. Its the little stuff that makes me write a review and this OBD scanner is worth it, looks durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: This works great on my 2003 BMW 525i
customer_reviews.text: This works great on my 2003 BMW 525i. I was able to easily pull BMW specific codes and clear them after diagnosing the problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. CROSBY

customer_reviews.title: used it on my prius cause check engine was on ...
customer_reviews.text: used it on my prius cause check engine was on. Did not work kept getting no response..Tried about 5 times same response.
customer_reviews.author: nami

customer_reviews.title: Have to have
customer_reviews.text: If you are a DIY person, then you need this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it's supposed to it reads the error codes as good as the one from our dealership
customer_reviews.author: amanda peterson

customer_reviews.title: right tool for the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of a check-engine light. It works well with both of our family cars, as well as an RV. Knowing what the light meant saved me the money a mechanic would have cost. It has already paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Fouts

customer_reviews.title: Nice scanner
customer_reviews.text: Works well I haven’t tried all the things it will do yet
customer_reviews.author: napafloat

customer_reviews.title: This works great! Even used it on all my American cars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my BMW because BMWs are high tolerance that even the most minor issues will cause a code. This works great! Even used it on all my American cars! This tool and you tube has save me hundreds in just labor alone! I’m a movie with cars but this tool is a life saver!!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Good scanner
customer_reviews.text: Good scanner for the $. Easy to use even for the novice
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: bought a cheaper one first and sent it back and got this one. Works great, easy to use have not had any issues with it not reading a code! Good price and great tool!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyB

product_meta.title: Autel AutoLink AL519 OBD2 Scanner Enhanced Mode 6 Automotive Engine Fault Code Reader CAN Diagnostic Scan Tool, Upgraded Ver. of AL319
product_meta.description: The AutoLink AL519 OBDII/EOBD Scanner supports all 10 modes of OBDII test for a complete diagnosis. Featuring the unique patented One-Click I/M Readiness Key, TFT color display and built-in speaker, the AutoLink AL519 is truly the ultimate in power and affordability, allowing users to do their jobs faster. In addition, thousands of troubleshooter code tips help technicians to save diagnosis and repair time.
feature_bullets: VERY EASY TO USE: The AutoLink AL519 OBDII/EOBD Scanner supports all 10 modes of OBDII test for a complete diagnosis. Featuring the unique patented One-Click I/M Readiness Key, TFT color display and built-in speaker, the AutoLink AL519 is truly the ultimate in power and affordability, allowing users to do their jobs faster. In addition, thousands of troubleshooter code tips help technicians to save diagnosis and repair time.

POWERFUL COMPATIBILITY: Works on most 1996 and newer vehicles (OBDII & CAN) – domestic and import; Features the unique patented One-Click Readiness Key for quick State Emissions readiness check and drive cycle verification. Bright color-coded LEDs and built-in speakers provide both visual and audible tones for readiness verification.

ACCURATE & FAST CAR DIAGNOSIS: This Autel AL519 can Retrieves generic (P0, P2, P3, and U0), manufacturer specific (P1, P3, and U1) codes and pending codes; Easily determines the cause of the Check Engine Light(MIL).Turns off Check Engine Light (MIL), clears codes and resets monitors. Displays DTC definition on the TFT color screen.Views freeze frame data.

EXCLUSIVE OBDII DIAGNOSTICS: Displays monitor and I/M readiness status (emissions).Reads live PCM datastream. Displays live O2 sensor test data. Graphs data (1996 and newer vehicles).Reads, stores, and playbacks live sensor data. Enhanced OBDII Mode 6.

UPDATE&Service: Customer service team is available for 24 hours:▲obdprice@hotmail.com▲Troubleshooter code tips guide technicians to the root cause of a trouble code faster, saving diagnosis and repair time. Retrieves vehicle information (VIN, CIN, and CVN). Multilingual menu and DTC definitions – English, Spanish and French, etc.Internet updateable.Prints data via PC.

specifications.Special Features: The scan tool allows you to make the following adjustments and settings: 1)Language: Selects the desired language. 2)Configure Monitors:Sets the monitors you want to test. 3)Unit of measure:Sets the unit of measure to English or Metric. 4)Key Beep Set: Turns on/off beep. 5)Status Beep Set: Turns on/off the I/M Readiness Status beep. 6)Tool Self-test:Checks if the LCD display, LED lamps and keyboard are working normally. 7)Update Mode: Accessesthe Update Mode.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,602 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
